readable.title: 3558438174_d8f41438a4
readable.content: Two ladies in skimpy clothes pose next to an old fashioned car . two scantily clad girls holding checkered flags standing on each side of a classic red car . Two spokesmodels in front of a hotrod . Two women holding checkered flags near an orange car . Two women in black with flags are standing in front of an old-fashioned car .
